select jp.job_group_id AS jobGroupId, t.tag_id AS tagId, t.tag_name AS tagName, t.create_at AS createDate, t.modified_at AS modifiedDate
from job_group jp join tag t on jp.job_group_id = t.job_group_id where jp.job_group_id = #{jobGroupId}
SELECT t.TAG_ID AS tagId, t.TAG_NAME AS tagName FROM JOB_POST_TAG jpt JOIN TAG t ON jpt.TAG_ID = t.TAG_ID WHERE jpt.JOB_POST = #{jobPostId}
SELECT RT.RESUME_TAG_ID AS resumeTag, T.TAG_ID AS tagId, T.TAG_NAME AS tagName FROM RESUME_TAG RT JOIN TAG T ON RT.TAG_ID = T.TAG_ID WHERE RESUME_ID = #{resumeId}
SELECT T.TAG_ID AS tagId, T.TAG_NAME AS tagName, T.JOB_GROUP_ID AS jobGroupId FROM TAG T WHERE UPPER(T.TAG_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%' || #{keyword} || '%') ORDER BY T.TAG_NAME
